CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1962, pg. A12, reads: "Urban League Guild Holds Successful Fashion Show at Hotel Penn-Sheraton - After the Show - Some of the members of the Pittsburgh Urban League Guild got together for this picture, with the commentator and coordinator of their recent Vogue Patterns Fashion Show in Urban Room of the Hotel Penn-Sheraton. Seated, left to right: Ruth Guyn, vice president of the guild; Mrs. Sandy Evarts, co-chairman of the show; Mrs. Alyce Parr, Guild president; Pat O'Brien, commentator, and Mrs. Mary Alexander, general chairman of the show.  Standing: Gilliam MacBain, fashion coordinator; Mrs. Jane Freeland, Mrs. Gertrude Dews, chairman of hostesses, Mrs. Cecile Springer, Mrs. Marjorie Keith, publicity chairman; Mrs. Virginia C. Lowe, pianist and Mrs. Dorothea Mason, membership chairman. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women, seated from left: Ruth Guyn, Sandy Evarts, Alyce Parr, Pat O'Brien, Mary Alexander; standing: Gilliam MacBain, Jane Freeland, Gertrude Dews, Cecile Springer wearing hat in center, Marjorie Keith, Virginia C. Lowe, and Dorothea Mason, posed on runway for Urban League Guild's Vogue Patterns Fashion Show, in Urban Room of Hotel Penn-Sheraton
